Cheltenham Festival Day 3 Races - Byrne Group Plate Odds

The Byrne Group Plate is a race that is steeped in history and is a regular on the Cheltenham Festival card, it takes place on Day 3 after the World Hurdle and will be a competitive renewal for punters to sink their teeth into. It is a race that will be of concern to favourite backers with no winner of the race since the turn of the century, in fact there has been one winner shorter than 12/1 in that period which highlights what a tough betting heat it is.
